amendment.description: Amendment expedites construction of two gaps in the 14 mile long barrier at the San Diego border.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 108-751 to expedite construction of two gaps in the 14 mile long barrier at the San Diego border.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ose amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 256 - 160 (Roll no. 519).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Ose.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
